footnotes: Sisi tutawaita askari wetu wamsaidie Muhammad na walio pamoja naye, na wapambane na huyo mwenye kukanya na wasaidizi wawasukume kwenye Jahannamu!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
